definition: to cheat/to swindle/to pretend/to feign/to draw sb out/to try to extract information by deceit or bluff

sentences.english: He was a sinister and crafty speculator.
sentences.chinese: 他是一個險詐的投機商。

sentences.english: There are more deceitful people than there are honest people.
sentences.chinese: 世人險詐者多而誠信者少。
